text:
"Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator" is a point-and-click survival horror video game created by Scott Cawthon. It is the sixth official main installment of the "Five Nights at Freddy's" game series. The game was released on December 4, 2017 for free on Steam and [https://gamejolt.com/games/ffps/304347 Gamejolt].
"Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator" received mostly positive reviews. GameCrate called it the "best value in gaming right now".
